name: [parts of us.]
description:
A super short, experimental kinetic VN with chill lo-fi beats to listen to. Headphones recommended.

Features:

  • 1920x1080
  • lush, free lo-fi beats
  • a music room
  • sky porn

You're welcome to use the backgrounds (in the image folder) for your own use. Please credit me, if you use them.

Trigger Warning for: Eating disorders, depression, body disphoria, gender disphoria, (some blood because of a paper cut)
